newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Endemol ups Circustheater stake to 100 pct.
newsitem.headline: Endemol ups Circustheater stake to 100 pct.

text.p: Endemol said on Monday it had raised its stake in the Circustheater entertainment venue in the Dutch seaside resort of Scheveningen to 100 percent.
Endemol said it had fully acquired Circustheater from Stardust Holding and Xelat Recrea, both of which held a 33 percent stake in the entertainment centre.
Endemol also takes over the entitlements to Circustheater profits of Stardust and Xelat, which each received 20 percent of the unit's profits.

The Circustheater staged the Dutch version of Phantom of the Opera between August 1993 and August 1996, attracting 1.8 million people. Its new production, Miss Saigon, began in November 1996. So far, 550,000 tickets have been sold.
